thread.title: Hilary
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Hilary

author: Hilary
title: Hilary
text: This was my first order with this company. I live in France but the currency was in Â£ as I wanted. Delivery of my barbour quilted jacket was very quick, although that was not a particular issue for me. I also liked the product so have not had to return it.
